argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ishlg.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ishlg.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | ishlg.k | |- K = ( c e. P |-> { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. P /\ b e. P ) /\ ( a =/= c /\ b =/= c /\ ( a e. ( c I b ) \/ b e. ( c I a ) ) ) ) } ) |
| 4 |  | ishlg.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 5 |  | ishlg.b | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 6 |  | ishlg.c | |- ( ph -> C e. P ) |
| 7 |  | hlcomd.1 | |- ( ph -> A ( K ` C ) B ) |
| 8 |  | hlln.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 9 |  | hlln.1 | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 11 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 12 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> C e. P ) |
| 13 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> A e. P ) |
| 14 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> B e. P ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> A e. ( C I B ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 10, 2, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 | #P_tgbtwncom | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> A e. ( B I C ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_3mix1d | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( C I B ) ) -> ( A e. ( B I C ) \/ B e. ( A I C ) \/ C e. ( B I A ) ) ) |
| 18 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 19 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> C e. P ) |
| 20 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> B e. P ) |
| 21 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> A e. P ) |
| 22 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> B e. ( C I A ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 10, 2, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22 | #P_tgbtwncom | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> B e. ( A I C ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_3mix2d | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> ( A e. ( B I C ) \/ B e. ( A I C ) \/ C e. ( B I A ) ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_ishlg | |- ( ph -> ( A ( K ` C ) B <-> ( A =/= C /\ B =/= C /\ ( A e. ( C I B ) \/ B e. ( C I A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 26 | 7, 25 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( A =/= C /\ B =/= C /\ ( A e. ( C I B ) \/ B e. ( C I A ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_simp3d | |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( C I B ) \/ B e. ( C I A ) ) ) |
| 28 | 17, 24, 27 | #P_mpjaodan | |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( B I C ) \/ B e. ( A I C ) \/ C e. ( B I A ) ) ) |
| 29 | 26 | #P_simp2d | |- ( ph -> B =/= C ) |
| 30 | 1, 8, 2, 9, 5, 6, 29, 4 | #P_tgellng | |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( B L C ) <-> ( A e. ( B I C ) \/ B e. ( A I C ) \/ C e. ( B I A ) ) ) ) |
| 31 | 28, 30 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> A e. ( B L C ) ) |
